trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades comuns para os estruturadores de atividades compostas que contêm esquemas structured.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner é a classe base para todos os designers que contêm os estruturadores de subordinados e os designers subordinados estão ligados entre si utilizando linhas compostas na superfície do design, conectores chamadas.

trans-unit.source: The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe é fornecida para que os programadores designer de atividade podem indicar um número de tipos de esquema do estruturador de atividades, em vez de a ser vinculada ao esquema fornecido a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada numa classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a vista de estruturador atual, apresentada pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ActiveView contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: ActiveView contém o ID de vista e qualquer texto, imagens, os estruturadores de atividades e os dados de utilizador associados a vista.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a vista atual apresentada pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser adicionadas para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> na localização especificada na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém a localização do ecrã em que a tentativa de inserir atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém as atividades para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades especificadas podem ser inseridas na localização especificada na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém as atividades para remover.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de só de leitura genérica que contém todos os estruturadores de atividades que são subordinados do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém os designers subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do destino de largar atual na matriz de destinos de largar devolvido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa o índice de destino de largar atual do designer.

trans-unit.source: Draws all of the connectors to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os conectores para apresentar no desenha a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Os conectores estão ligações entre os estruturadores separados numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
trans-unit.target: Estas ligações aparecem como linhas na superfície de desenho e cada extremidade de linha se liga a um ponto de visível nos designers para estabelecer a ligação.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Estes pontos são designadas por pontos de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> no qual desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> para desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> matriz que contém os pontos finais para cada um dos conectores para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> que determina o gráfico para desenhar em pontos de início de conector.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> que determina o gráfico para desenhar em pontos finais de conector.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o designer de atividade especificada está visível a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para o qual Certifique-se de visibilidade na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject devolve <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associada com a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A>propriedade que é exposta através de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz das localizações de largar válido a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> superfície.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to query the design surface with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para consultar a superfície do design com.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que representa as localizações de largar válido no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> superfície.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma coleção só de leitura dos pontos que representam os pontos de ligação interna para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Os conectores estão ligações entre os estruturadores separados numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
trans-unit.target: Estas ligações aparecem como linhas na superfície de desenho e cada extremidade de linha se liga a um ponto de visível em cada designer liga-se.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Estes pontos são designadas por pontos de ligação.

trans-unit.source: Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and GetInnerConnections returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Estruturador classes que herdam a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>classe pode conter outros designers e GetInnerConnections devolve uma coleção só de leitura de todos os pontos de ligação para os designers associados `edges` que estão contidos por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
trans-unit.target: DesignerEdges ao longo do que procurar pontos de ligação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> coleção genérica de só de leitura que contém os pontos de ligação interior do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto selecionável primeiro que se segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação para o atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro selecionável que segue o obj parâmetro na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o estruturador utilizando a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Initialize ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
trans-unit.target: Inicializar garante que a vista ativa carregada para a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho é uma vista válida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com a qual ao inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona as atividades especificadas para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> na localização especificada na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que especifica a localização para adicionar as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém as atividades para adicionar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, LastSelectableObject returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>é a atividade de Active Directory estruturador, LastSelectableObject devolve `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
trans-unit.target: Se for um designer de atividade subordinada é o estruturador de Active Directory, devolve o último objeto selecionável associado com o designer de subordinados do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado de visualização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> partir de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>utilizados para restaurar o estado de visualização do estruturador.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: readercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as definições de tamanho mínimo para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho menor possíveis para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to another.
trans-unit.target: Move as atividades especificadas de um designer apresentado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> para outro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém a localização na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho para mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection to move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção só de leitura para mover.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o estruturador quando a atividade associada é alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the changed activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a atividade foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: e is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: eé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando mais do que uma das atividades contém foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the activities that changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre as atividades que foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação de arrastar largar é concluída com dos limites da respetiva superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato o utilizador introduz os limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato o utilizador sai dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato do utilizador está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de eventos da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de esquema para a posição ajudas visuais e designers subordinado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o tamanho dos ajudas visuais nos designers apresentado pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o novo tamanho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta os verbos estruturador associados com uma etiqueta inteligente numa localização especificada na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa a localização na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho para o qual pretende mostrar <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the current designer view changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o estruturador atual ver as alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que está a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado de vista atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> para uma transmissão em fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>para que o atual estado de visualização estruturador é armazenado.</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> apresenta etiquetas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estruturador apresenta etiquetas inteligentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção só de leitura de estruturador ações que estão associados com as etiquetas inteligentes no estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é devolvida apenas se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>aloja várias vistas.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>propriedade para determinar quantos vistas os anfitriões de estruturador atuais.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém todas as ações associadas com as etiquetas inteligentes no estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> hosts.
trans-unit.target: Obter uma coleção de só de leitura de estruturador vistas que atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> anfitriões.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém as vistas hospedadas atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.
